file.name: rest-openapi.yaml
file.content:
components:
    parameters:
        accountIdsQueryParam:
            in: query
            explode: true
            name: accountIds
            required: false
            schema:
                items:
                    format: int64
                    type: integer
                type: array
            style: form
        categoryIdsQueryParam:
            in: query
            explode: true
            name: categoryIds
            required: false
            schema:
                items:
                    format: int64
                    type: integer
                type: array
            style: form
        forecastLengthQueryParam:
            in: query
            explode: true
            name: forecastLength
            required: false
            schema:
                type: integer
            style: form
        forecastStartDateQueryParam:
            in: query
            explode: true
            name: forecastStartDate
            required: false
            schema:
                format: date
                type: string
            style: form
        historyLengthQueryParam:
            in: query
            explode: true
            name: historyLength
            required: false
            schema:
                type: integer
            style: form
    responses:
        NotFound:
            content:
                application/json:
                    schema:
                        $ref: "#/components/schemas/Error"
                application/xml:
                    schema:
                        $ref: "#/components/schemas/Error"
            description:
                The specified resource was not found
        UnauthorizedError:
            content:
                application/json:
                    schema:
                        $ref: "#/components/schemas/Error"
                application/xml:
                    schema:
                        $ref: "#/components/schemas/Error"
            description:
                Authentication information is missing or invalid
    schemas:
        AccountCategoryForecast:
            properties:
                account:
                    format: int64
                    type: integer
                actual:
                    format: float
                    type: number
                category:
                    format: int64
                    type: integer
                categoryTitle:
                    type: string
                forecast:
                    format: float
                    type: number
                forecastLowerBound:
                    format: float
                    type: number
                forecastUpperBound:
                    format: float
                    type: number
                timestamp:
                    format: date-time
                    type: string
                unit:
                    type: string
            type: object
        AccountForecast:
            properties:
                account:
                    format: int64
                    type: integer
                actual:
                    format: float
                    type: number
                forecast:
                    format: float
                    type: number
                forecastLowerBound:
                    format: float
                    type: number
                forecastUpperBound:
                    format: float
                    type: number
                timestamp:
                    format: date-time
                    type: string
                unit:
                    type: string
            type: object
        Error:
            properties:
                errorCode:
                    description:
                        Internal error code mapping
                    example: 996
                    readOnly: true
                    type: integer
                errorDescription:
                    example: Unable to find currency. Currency code should be expressed with
                        3-letter ISO 4217 format.
                    readOnly: true
                    type: string
                message:
                    example: No CommerceCurrency exists with the key {groupId=41811, code=US
                        Dollar}
                    readOnly: true
                    type: string
                status:
                    description:
                        HTTP Status code
                    example: 404
                    readOnly: true
                    type: integer
            required:
                - errorCode
                - errorDescription
                - message
                - status
            type: object
    securitySchemes:
        BasicAuth:
            scheme: basic
            type: http
        BearerAuth:
            scheme: bearer
            type: http
        OAuth2:
            flows:
                authorizationCode:
                    authorizationUrl: /oauth/authorize
                    scopes:
                        CommerceOpenApiForecast.read: Grants read access
                    tokenUrl: /oauth/token
            type: oauth2
info:
    contact:
        email: team-commerce@liferay.com
        name: Commerce Team
    description:
        Liferay Commerce Forecast API
    title: Liferay Commerce Forecast API
    version: v1.0
openapi: 3.0.0
paths:
    /accountCategoryForecasts/by-monthlyRevenue:
        get:
            description:
                Get the forecast points
            operationId: getAccountCategoryForecastsByMonthlyRevenuePage
            parameters:
                - in: query
                  explode: true
                  name: accountIds
                  required: false
                  schema:
                      items:
                          format: int64
                          type: integer
                      type: array
                  style: form
                - in: query
                  explode: true
                  name: categoryIds
                  required: false
                  schema:
                      items:
                          format: int64
                          type: integer
                      type: array
                  style: form
                - in: query
                  explode: true
                  name: forecastLength
                  required: false
                  schema:
                      type: integer
                  style: form
                - in: query
                  explode: true
                  name: forecastStartDate
                  required: false
                  schema:
                      format: date
                      type: string
                  style: form
                - in: query
                  explode: true
                  name: historyLength
                  required: false
                  schema:
                      type: integer
                  style: form
                - in: query
                  name: page
                  required: false
                  schema:
                      type: integer
                - in: query
                  name: pageSize
                  required: false
                  schema:
                      type: integer
            responses:
                "200":
                    content:
                        application/json:
                            example:
                                items:
                                    - account: 36415
                                      actual: 43855
                                      category: 36312
                                      forecast: 1.4E-45
                                      forecastLowerBound: 0

                                lastPage: 1

                                pageSize: 20
                                totalCount: 12
                            schema:
                                items:
                                    $ref: "#/components/schemas/AccountCategoryForecast"
                                type: array
                        application/xml:
                            schema:
                                items:
                                    $ref: "#/components/schemas/AccountCategoryForecast"
                                type: array
                    description:
                        Successful operation
                "400":
                    description:
                        Invalid input
                "401":
                    content:
                        application/json:
                            schema:
                                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Error"
                        application/xml:
                            schema:
                                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Error"
                    description:
                        Authentication information is missing or invalid
                "404":
                    content:
                        application/json:
                            schema:
                                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Error"
                        application/xml:
                            schema:
                                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Error"
                    description:
                        The specified resource was not found
                "500":
                    content:
                        application/json:
                            schema:
                                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Error"
                        application/xml:
                            schema:
                                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Error"
                    description:
                        Unexpected error
            security:
                - BasicAuth: []
                - BearerAuth: []
                - OAuth2:
                      - CommerceOpenApiForecast.read
            tags:
                - AccountCategoryForecast

servers:
    - description:
          Liferay Commerce API server
      url: https://commerce.{environment}.liferay.com/commerce-forecast/{basePath}
      variables:
          basePath:
              default: v1.0
          environment:
              default: api
              enum:
                  - api
                  - api.dev
                  - api.uat
    - description:
          Liferay Commerce Local Development (Hosts file)
      url: "{protocol}://{host}:{port}/o/commerce-forecast/{basePath}"
      variables:
          basePath:
              default: v1.0
          host:
              default: test.dev
          port:
              default: "8080"
              enum:
                  - "443"
                  - "8080"
                  - "8443"
          protocol:
              default: http
              enum:
                  - http
                  - https
    - description:
          Liferay Commerce Local Development with Ngrok
      url: "{protocol}://{host}.ngrok.io/o/commerce-forecast/{basePath}"
      variables:
          basePath:
              default: v1.0
          host:
              default: commerce
          protocol:
              default: http
              enum:
                  - http
                  - https
    - description:
          SwaggerHub API Auto Mocking
      url: https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/liferayinc/commerce-forecast/1.0.0
    - description:
          SwaggerHub API Auto Mocking
      url: https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/liferayinc/commerce-forecast/v1.0
